item.title: What is FedNow and How Will the Payment System Work?
item.description: FedNow: A New Payment System from the Federal Reserve The Federal Reserve is developing a new payment system called FedNow. FedNow will allow for instant payments between banks, 24/7, 365 days a year. FedNow is expected to be available in 2023.
